name: Scholar's Pack
description: An academic's kit containing scholarly supplies and research materials for traveling scholars and wizards. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Robes, Book, Ink Bottle, Ink Pen, Lamp, Parchment (10 sheets), Tinderbox, Dagger, Rope (50 feet)
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
